Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class rev::DagNode< T >

A node of a Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG)

A directed acyclic graph is more generalized notion of a tree structure, except that in a DAG, a child may have more than one parent, as opposed to in a tree, where each child may only have at most one parent.

Note
To achieve functionality without memory leaks, all DAG nodes are cached in a static map.

To completely delete a DAG node, they must be manually erased from this static map using the eraseFromNodeMap method.
